652f071b-4183-4b70-90ca-e66a9de7db4e.description: Certified Customer Value Optimization Specialists are uniquely qualified to help businesses architect a conversion funnel that reduces initial customer acquisition costs, while simultaneously increasing both immediate and lifetime customer values. In short, while most businesses have some sort of funnel for on-boarding leads and converting those leads into customers, Customer Value Optimization Specialists are able to plug the leaks and deliver a truly optimized conversion funnel.
652f071b-4183-4b70-90ca-e66a9de7db4e.name: Certified Customer Value Optimization Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 6 module, 56 lesson online course.
Pass 6 quizzes and a final exam that tests on the full spectrum of conversion funnel optimization tactics and strategies.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

33750655-dd79-4623-b21f-50ea02726de0.description: Certified Content Marketing Specialists are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses develop and execute a sustainable content marketing program. They are trained to create and measure engaging content at every stage of the marketing funnel, as well as leveraging organic and paid traffic to leverage content across the social web.
33750655-dd79-4623-b21f-50ea02726de0.name: Certified Content Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 6 module, 40 lesson online course
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The educational program and assessments assure the recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

6d2a77ae-5b9b-4b36-ac6c-b957bbc56427.description: Certified Customer Acquisition Specialists are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses leverage paid traffic channels such Google, Facebook and other demand-gen platforms to grow their customer base without breaking the bank. In short, Customer Acquisition Specialists are able to not only deliver fresh leads and customers they are able to deliver those leads and customers at a PROFIT.
6d2a77ae-5b9b-4b36-ac6c-b957bbc56427.name: Certified Customer Acquisition Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 6 module, 35 lesson online course
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

2e10bfb5-0f32-416d-8973-0decc3a55544.description: Certified Direct-Response Copywriting Specialists are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses get people to take specific, measurable actions — driving them to make purchases or become sales leads. They are trained to write copy for offline media such as direct-mail letters, print ads, etc., as well as online marketing tactics such as emails, web pages, paid search ads.
2e10bfb5-0f32-416d-8973-0decc3a55544.name: Direct-Response Copywriting Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 6 module, 41 lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

80b6754c-10e2-498d-a34f-e2e52f56c4ad.description: Certified Email Marketing Specialists are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses leverage email marketing and followup to indoctrinate, create relationships with and convert prospects and existing customers. In short, Email Marketing Specialists are able to not only effectively follow up with fresh leads and customers they know how to craft email campaigns that get delivered, get opened, and most importantly...get clicked.
80b6754c-10e2-498d-a34f-e2e52f56c4ad.name: Certified Email Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 7 module, 48 lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

c87dac1f-0961-4edf-a630-dea860fd0d29.description: Ecommerce Marketing Specialists are uniquely qualified to help businesses optimize any e-commerce store, in any industry, to generate more sales and profit. From e-commerce store design and architecture to email marketing and traffic generation, this masterclass contains everything needed to compete in today’s e-commerce landscape.
c87dac1f-0961-4edf-a630-dea860fd0d29.name: Certified Ecommerce Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 5 module, 40 lessons online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The educational program and assessments assure the recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

1005af6c-8cda-44f1-ba58-64c565106479.description: Social & Community Managers are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses leverage social media channels such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn and YouTube. In short, a certified Social & Community Manager is capable of leveraging all four stages of social media success: Social Listening, Social Influencing, Social Networking and Social Selling.
1005af6c-8cda-44f1-ba58-64c565106479.name: Certified Social & Community Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced 5 module, 62 lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

b0d1c083-02fb-4170-8e10-28c456be11e1.description: Certified Search Marketing Specialists are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses develop and execute a sustainable search marketing program. They are trained to identify and capitalize on search demand from platforms like Google, Amazon, YouTube and iTunes. The methods they have been taught are within the terms of service of these platforms.
b0d1c083-02fb-4170-8e10-28c456be11e1.name: Certified Search Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 5 module, 70 lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

27f3c0e6-7fe9-4310-b99b-be8378742b85.description: Certified Analytics & Data Specialists have the necessary skills to track and analyze the metrics that matter to businesses at all stages, from content marketing and paid traffic strategies to website and funnel performance. They also learn the analytical skills necessary to turn data into action, helping businesses get more leads and sales. In short, Analytics & Data specialists are able to make marketing decisions based on meaningful data, not hopeful hunches.
27f3c0e6-7fe9-4310-b99b-be8378742b85.name: Certified Analytics & Data Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 7 module, 72 lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The educational program and assessments assure the recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

985258a0-2fb1-4ede-8bd1-5dd7cf926703.description: In this master class, you will learn the newest strategies (by social platform) to draw organic traffic to your social media sites. You will also learn how to develop a social media calendar and develop a schedule for your post to make sure your content is relevant and top of mind for your audience. You will also learn how to leverage influencer marketing and see if it is right for your overall marketing goals.
985258a0-2fb1-4ede-8bd1-5dd7cf926703.name: Certified Social Media Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a comprehensive 8 hour and 10 minute training laid out over 7 modules.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

d3a41745-8942-4177-b8c6-01f4f82ab7bf.description: Certified Optimization & Testing Specialists are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses develop a repeatable optimization process to increase conversions in their sales funnel, landing pages, and key conversion pages. In short, Optimization & Testing Specialists are able to diagnose site problems and test new solutions that increase PROFITS for traffic you ALREADY HAVE.
d3a41745-8942-4177-b8c6-01f4f82ab7bf.name: Certified Optimization & Testing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 7 module, 4- lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The educational program and assessments assure the recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

aa129c1b-a8a9-4f80-8f92-0d3f5eedd244.description: The Digital Marketing Mastery Class is the most comprehensive digital marketing training in the industry. The earner of this badge is a “T-shaped” marketer and has a top-level overview of the major channels of digital marketing including: content marketing, social media marketing, digital advertising, search marketing, email marketing, community management, and data and optimization.
aa129c1b-a8a9-4f80-8f92-0d3f5eedd244.name: Digital Marketing Strategist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced 16-hour, 10 module, 110 lesson online course.
Pass a 75-question final exam.
The educational program and assessments assure the recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

88771445-9177-48c3-b0a0-ba4db4e74858.description: Certified Community Management Specialists are qualified to help brands and businesses create, grow, and maintain thriving online communities that drive business value - providing a powerful tool to build leads, sales, and loyalty. They can properly apply communities into the marketing mix that benefits both brands and community members, transform traditionally transactional customer relationships into strong emotional bonds, and keep the community environment safe through moderation strategies.
88771445-9177-48c3-b0a0-ba4db4e74858.name: Community Management Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 7 module, 58 lesson online course.
Pass a 50 question multiple choice final exam.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

22bd58c4-965e-4423-b6e1-5818135fa578.description: In this master class, you'll learn about the foundations of SEO including in-depth dives into On-page SEO, Technical SEO, Off-page SEO, and Local SEO. You'll learn tactile strategies such as how to do keyword research, competitor research, optimize your content strategy for on-page SEO, how to take advantage of broken link building, and establish your authority with Google. You'll learn how to optimize your Google My Business Profile in hopes of getting ranked in the Local 3 Pack on PageOne.
22bd58c4-965e-4423-b6e1-5818135fa578.name: Certified Search Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.
Complete a comprehensive 6 hour and 10-minute training laid out over 6 modules.
Access and complete the Search Marketing Mastery Workbook.
Pass a 50 question multiple-choice exam.

70a22710-779b-4f82-b7a3-94f1494bd680.description: Certified Digital Marketing Professionals are uniquely qualified to help brands and businesses develop and execute a sustainable and comprehensive digital marketing program.
70a22710-779b-4f82-b7a3-94f1494bd680.name: Certified Digital Marketing Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete eight advanced online courses (totaling 43 modules with 419 video lessons).
Pass 34 quizzes, 8 exams and a specialized comprehensive final exam and final project.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

15ac1b9a-b8eb-41f9-aa1d-b3087e7278ac.description: DigitalMarketer’s Head of Marketing Bootcamp focuses on the 4 key skills of marketing leaders: strategy, execution, measurement, and optimization. Mastery of these skills is the difference between being a specialist in a specific marketing discipline and actually holistically understanding marketing strategy. Those who have successfully completed the Bootcamp are equipped with the skills, knowledge, and “in the trenches” experience to execute an integrated marketing strategy that drives growth.
15ac1b9a-b8eb-41f9-aa1d-b3087e7278ac.name: Professional Certificate in Marketing: Head of Marketing Bootcamp

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 8-module, 16-hour virtual classroom course.

The recipient has used the frameworks and concepts learned to complete a capstone project that displays mastery in building an integrated marketing strategy from start to finish and identifying opportunities for compounding growth.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.

efb35ae5-c9f5-498d-9848-26dae8460dfa.description: During this tactical 5 week course, enrollees will master the core skills that every Media Buyer must possess in order to be successful in the current state of paid advertising. Each session will mix strategy with execution and enrollees will get real-time instructor feedback to give a clear path to success. Those who successfully complete the Bootcamp will emerge with the skills, knowledge, and “in the trenches” experience that only a true Media Buyer can possess.
efb35ae5-c9f5-498d-9848-26dae8460dfa.name: Professional Certificate in Media Buying: Media Buyer Bootcamp

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an advanced, 10 module, 20 hour virtual classroom course.
The recipient has used the frameworks and concepts learned to complete a capstone project that displays mastery in the core skills every Media Buyer must know to execute successful campaigns.
The recipient has attained a level of competence appropriate for professional practice.
